properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ORDER_NO , MEM_ID , TO_CHAR(REF_RQ_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "REF_RQ_DT" , DECODE(REF_FIN_DT, NULL, '-', TO_CHAR(REF_FIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) "REF_FIN_DT" , TO_CHAR(REF_PRICE, '999,999,999') || '원' "REF_PRICE" , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "REG_DATE" , DECODE(REG_PAY, 0, '카드', 1, '무통장') "REG_PAY" , CL_NO , DECODE(REF_STA, 'N', '환불신청', 'Y', '환불완료') "REF_STA" , REF_REA FROM REFUND RF JOIN MEMBER M ON(RF.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) JOIN REGISTER ON(ORDER_NO = REG_NO) ORDER BY REF_RQ_DT DESC) WHERE REF_STA LIKE ?
